item.title: To make objects give exp
item.dc:creator: @cc987 cc987
item.description:
@cc987 wrote:

Purpose: to make objects give exp

Difficulty: 3

Assumed Knowledge:how to read

Server Base:fr33sc4p3(all)

Classes Modified: client.java

first u have to have an object that doesnt give exp so go here

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

now u have ur object open client.java and search for

OBJECT CLICK ONE

you should see

case 1531: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("oooh Yeaahhh Fuck that door"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(1658); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[18]), 18); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;
or something like dat
under break; put

case OBJECTID: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("THE MESSAGE U GET"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(1658); addSkillXP((AMMOUNT OF EXP*playerLevel[THE SKILLS NUMBER]), THE SKILLS NUMBER); stillgfx(GFX U WANT, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

CREDITS:ME(tell me if it has been posted for)

Read full topic
